result.execSummary:
The defendant Bobby Joe June was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

CASES: 14CF179, 14CF195 & 14CF61.  CW-clerk 10:46 am.  
14CF179-Amended Information filed.  Count 2-NC plea.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty & enter JOC.  SENTENCE:  14CF179-32 days PCJ=time served. Waiving fine/costs. 
14CF195-Amended Information filed.  Count 1-guilty.  Count 2-guilty.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty, NOT enter JOC.  DJOC filed w/ court-12 mo DJOC.  Bond is amended to $1000 signature bond.  Bound by all non-monetary conditions including Defendant shall neither directly or indirectly threaten, harass, intimidate or otherwise interfere with victims or witnesses in this action.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.  No abusive contact w/ Ms Wallace. Not to possess or consume alcohol.  $250 DNA surcharge.  
Court modifies face of bonds, (now misd bonds), adding no abusive contact w/ Ms Wallace, striking not to be at 121 West Clayton Ave, Clayton.  Def to resign both bonds.
